description:
This library links in the STM32Cube version of LwIP to your project. It does _not_ include the stub ethernetif.c and other assorted files required to use the Ethernet library. These may be released as a separate library at some point
in the future, however for now copy them from an STM32CubeMX project. If you include the FreeRTOS library as well, a CubeMX project should compile under platformio.

<todo config>
name: STM32Cube Middleware-LwIP
